title: Northwestern Medicine COVID-19 Center | Chronic COVID Disease
description: The Northwestern Medicine Comprehensive COVID-19 Center will provide a multidisciplinary, coordinated approach to treatment for patients with chronic COVID-19.
cleaned_text: | | Featuring: The Northwestern Medicine Comprehensive COVID-19 Center will provide a multidisciplinary, coordinated approach to treatment for patients with chronic COVID-19 disease. The center brings together a care team comprised of expert specialists in a variety of fields: Cardiology Gastroenterology Hematology Infectious disease Internal medicine Nephrology Neurology Physical medicine and rehabilitation Pulmonary Psychiatry | | Northwestern Medicine welcomes the opportunity to partner with you in caring for your patients.
